short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
short.vi: Cộng trừ nhân chia đơn giản

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activ Gift Card app is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, division and calculate basic arithmetic expressions. Integrated with an easy-to-use interface and friendly design, this application is a convenient tool for daily calculations.

Main feature:

Basic math operations: Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division.
Friendly interface: Use Bootstrap to create a beautiful and easy-to-use user interface.
Safe and secure: Use the mathjs library to safely evaluate mathematical expressions.
Updated versions: The application is maintained and updated regularly to ensure performance and stability.
Fits anytime, anywhere: Works on any website when opened in the Chrome browser.
User manual:

Tap the app icon on Chrome's toolbar to open the app.
Use the number and operator buttons to enter the expression to be calculated.
Press the "=" button to display the result or "C" to clear the screen.
Note:

The Activ Gift Card Calculator application is not only a simple calculator but also a powerful utility tool, helping you quickly solve arithmetic operations without opening a peripheral calculator.

The application is made by Activ Gift Card Store, a unit specializing in checking the balance of Activated Gift Cards - Store Gift Cards
